metadata.title: CVE-2024-38556 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Add a timeout to acquire the command queue semaphorePrevent forced completion handling on an entry that has not yet beenassigned an index, causing an out of bounds access on idx = -22.Instead of waiting indefinitely for the sem, blocking flow now waits forindex to be allocated or a sem acquisition timeout before beginning thetimer for FW completion.Kernel log example:mlx5_core 0000:06:00.0: wait_func_handle_exec_timeout:1128:(pid 185911):cmd[-22]: CREATE_UCTX(0xa04) No done completion
